thiefworld.agents

Class Child

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.ActiveAgent
        • thiefworld.agents.Child
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class Child
extends ActiveAgent
    Describes a child agent that can only observe others perform actions.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
